alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:06PM EST until January 26 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO NOON EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Western Franklin, Northern Worcester, Western Hampshire and Northern Middlesex Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to noon EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light accumulations of ice are likely above 800ft in the Worcester Hills and eastern Berkshires as temperatures drop to near or just below freezing overnight. While widespread freezing rain is not expected, it only takes minor accumulations of ice to create hazardous driving conditions. It is often difficult to differentiate icy surfaces from wet ones; Residents of northern MA, and especially the Route 2 corridor should take extra precautions during the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.

area.areaDesc: Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire
